name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: @queencity_dukes But just like the town can't go put lights up on their own, the Feds can't either. The provincial government decides that.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: @queencity_dukes The Conservative gov't invested over $200 million for the overpasses. If the province decides to put lights up, they can.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: @queencity_dukes It's not a question of $. The Province has to decide to put lights up. The Feds can't force them.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: @queencity_dukes Only the provincial government has the authority to put up traffic lights. Contact your MLA.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: Mon épouse et moi garderons le Président Nolin dans nos prières alors que nous réfléchirons à son héritage.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: Today my wife and I will keep Speaker Nolin and his loved ones in our prayers as we reflect on his legacy and service to Canada.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: J’offre mes plus sincères condoléances à l’épouse, aux enfants et aux petits-enfants du Président Nolin, ainsi qu’à ses amis et à sa famille

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: I offer my deepest sympathies to Speaker Nolin’s wife, children and grandchildren, and to his friends and family.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: C’est avec une grande tristesse que la communauté parlementaire souligne le décès d’un grand Canadien, Pierre Claude Nolin.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: It is with great sadness that the parliamentary community marks the death of a great Canadian, Senate Speaker Pierre Claude Nolin.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: It was a profound honour to be able to work with someone of his intelligence and integrity.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: He will be deeply missed by his friends and colleagues in the House and Senate.

name: Andrew Scheer
tweet: On behalf of all Members of the House, I offer my deepest sympathies to Speaker Nolin's wife, children, grandchildren, friends and family.
